comment: 100% knows her stuff. She's an amazing professor and makes you want to learn the material. Absolutely recommend her as a professor and will be taking again. Material isn't hard if you honestly just listen and class and pay attention with your labs. Best professor I've ever had.

Fazlollah is the best professor I have ever taken in my nearly 3 years at KSU. She was hilarious, kept you interested on the topics, and extremely personable and approachable. The material may appear intimidating at first but between the way Fazlollah teaches and the labs it is easy to remember. I will be taking any and all classes she teaches!

This was one of my favorite classes ever took at KSU. Attendance is not mandatory, but she gives extra credit if you do come on the days where nobody shows up. She has three tests, participation quizzes every class and discussion posts. TAKE HER IF YOU CAN!!!!

She is a FANTASTIC teacher. Our class had awesome discussions everyday. She is also the type of teacher that will call you out though, and she absolutely despises it when students are late. And if you miss a class, she doesn't post the powerpoint online nor will she give it to you. But overall totally take this class!! My favorite class EVER!

Dr. Faz is absolutely amazing. She is passionate about what she does and wants to share her knowledge. I think 2105 is actually over after this year, but find another class of her's to take. She's witty, intelligent, and hilarious.
I love this teacher. Not only is she an amazing piece of eye candy I drool over every Tuesday and Thursday morning, she is just as smart and witty as she is beautiful.

Fazlollah is a really fun professor to have as she manages to turn every class into a class discussion about the subject at hand. The class itself is easy with 3 tests, some quizzes, and 5 discussion posts based on articles from the text. Super laid back class.

She is a great professor. Gives a lot of quizzes but she tells you ahead of time about them. Tests are kinda long but since they are multiple choice its not difficult. Interesting material and she is very  knowledgeable about the subject.

She was one of the best professors I've had at KSU. You do have reading assignments for every class, with "pop quizzes" (you have one basically every class) but they're very easy if you read. She makes anthropology very interest and she's hilarious!! I would recommend her to anyone.

Fantastic teacher, turns a large lecture hall to a group discussion every class. She helps point out how easy it is to be ethnocentric of others and broaden your horizons. It's best to go to class because her powerpoints are not posted online. Her tests consist of mostly vocab, but do have some concepts over readings. Every test had extra credit!

I love this professor. I've taken two classes with her, Anthropology of Death and Human Origins. I'd take as many as I could. She is very clear but understanding if you don't get it. She is also very funny which makes some boring material bearable. Do the work and you will pass the class.
She is very approachable and easy to talk to.  She is also very hot.

Nothing good or bad about her. The class is pretty boring. Showed up because she had a quiz over the reading each class. She says there will be a lot of debatesdiscussions at the start of the semester. We had maybe 1 debate for 5 mins and really just everyone agreeing with each other. The readings were more interesting than the lectures.

Fantastic teacher! Gives quizzes for a participation grade almost every class so you must go and you must read, but the topics are interesting and she makes the class entertaining and informative. This was one class I never wanted to skip. I loved her so much I'm taking another one her classes next semester.

Overall, awesome professor! She kept the atmosphere very light, comfortable and funny. She did this while also utilizing good teaching strategies to not only make it easier to learn and comprehend the material but also to provide a desire to learn her subject because of the passion she has for it. A Laugh A Class! Many Participation Exercises.
AMazingly cool and awesome. best teacher i had

Fazlollah is so awesome. She really knows her stuff and is so passionate about it. She wants students to succeed but isn't going to hand you the grade. You do have to work for it. She moves through the material super fast so while attendance isnt mandatory, you should be there. She's hilarious and will make you enjoy her class every day. Take her!
Favorite professor i've had at KSU. She makes every class enjoyable to come to. The class consists of one simple group project, 3 tests, and random quizzes over the reading. Take her if you can!
Attendance isn't mandatory but you need to show up because of her "random" participation assignments (quizzes). She values participation in class discussions and is a very interesting professor.

This was one of the best classes I've ever taken at Kennesaw. It entails one group project and one paper, but besides that, it's mostly daily work and three quizzes. The topics we talk about are interesting enough, but the professor and her talking points as well as her sense of humor are the main reasons to take this 10 week course. Do it.
